directions: Combine mayonnaise, sour cream, milk, blue cheese, hot sauce, horseradish, and garlic powder in a bowl. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours to let flavors blend.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) jar mayonnaise (such as Hellmann's®/Best Foods®)
1 (4 ounce) package crumbled blue cheese, or more to taste
⅛ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
title: Blue Cheese Horseradish Dressing
